newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 12 muni bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 12 muni bond issues for insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp. said on Wednesday that it qualified for bond insurance the following 12 issues scheduled for competitive sale:
--Esparto Unified School District, Calif., $1 million General Obligations (GO).
--Santa Rosa High School District, Calif., $18.2 million GOs.
--Second South Madison, Ind., $7.7 million first mortgage bonds.
--Albany City School District, N.Y., $13.975 million GOs.
--Perry Central School District, N.Y., $1.525 million GOs.
--Tulsa County ISD #9, Okla., $13,675 million building bonds.
--Aiken County Cons School District, S.C., $9.6 million.
--Faulkey Gully MUD, Texas, Unlimited Tax bonds, $2.52 million.
